Title: I think this opinion is backwards of the typical opinion but I think FP is easier to read but harder...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: I think this opinion is backwards of the typical opinion but I think FP is easier to read but harder to write than imperative. When you start a for loop you just start writing the for loop and there's only one way to get started but when you want to iterate in idiomaticâ€¦
